description.value: Creature is animalistic, regardless of intelligence stat. Does not need to make survival checks whilst in its natural environment. Unless Starving, Desperate, or mad, must make a Willpower test when frightened, startled, or injured. On a fail it flees from source of danger.

system.benefit: Creature is animalistic, regardless of intelligence stat. Does not need to make survival checks whilst in its natural environment. Unless Starving, Desperate, or mad, must make a Willpower test when frightened, startled, or injured. On a fail it flees from source of danger.
